sentences.sContent: Anna looks after costumes and props.

trans.tranCn: 支柱，支撑物；支持者；道具；（橄榄球中的）支柱前锋
trans.tranOther: an object placed under or against something to hold it in a particular position

trans.tranCn: 支撑，支持，维持；使倚靠在某物上
trans.tranOther: to support something by leaning it against something, or by putting something else under, next to, or behind it
